mapper.sql: select id, file_id, file_name, dept_id, belongteam, download_userid, download_user, download_time from dms_download_records
mapper.select: SELECT ddr.file_id, ddr.file_name, ddr.belongteam, COUNT(*) as download_count from dms_download_records ddr inner join dms_file_info dfi on ddr.file_id =dfi.file_id where dfi.file_status =3 GROUP BY ddr.file_id, ddr.file_name, ddr.belongteam ORDER BY download_count DESC LIMIT 10

select sd.dept_name as label, coalesce(count(case when u.dept_id = sd.dept_id then 1 else null end), 0) as file_num from sys_dept sd left join (dms_download_records fdr join sys_user u ON fdr.download_userid = u.user_id) on u.dept_id = sd.dept_id group by sd.dept_name;

select sdd.dict_label as label,sdd.dict_value as classified_id, coalesce(count(case when fi.file_type = sdd.dict_value then 1 else null end), 0) as file_num from sys_dict_data sdd left join (dms_download_records fdr join dms_file_info fi ON fdr.file_id = fi.file_id) on fi.file_type = sdd.dict_value where sdd.dict_type = 'dms_file_type' group by sdd.dict_label,sdd.dict_value
